borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Variation of Condition 2 of planning permission ref: 2018/03008/FUL granted 8th February 2019 for the "Conversion of an existing single family dwelling house to provide 3no. self-contained dwellings, consisting of 1no. two bedroom maisonette, 1no. three bedroom maisonette, and 1no. five bedroom maisonette; erection of a rear roof extension including the formation of a hip to gable roof extension; erection of a part one, part two, part three storey rear extension at ground, first and second floor levels; excavation of the front garden and part of the rear garden to form lightwells, in connection with the creation of a new basement; alterations to the front elevation including the installation of 2no. front entrance doors to replace existing entrance door and installation of 2no. windows at first floor level to replace existing window."Proposed amendments are to allow the demolition and re-building of part of the flank wall; replacement of slate roofing to the mono-pitch roof over the ground floor rear extension with zinc cladding; replacement of one window with timber doors to the rear elevation at first floor level; amendments to the size and position of other rear windows at first floor level; replacement of glazing with louvred openings to the rear elevation at first and second floor level; enlargement of dormer windows at second floor level.
